intro: At bra.gov.so, accessible through the official website of the Banadir Regional Administration (BRA), the privacy and protection of your personal data are fundamental to our mandate of transparent and accountable governance. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and the rights you have regarding your personal data.
If you have questions or require additional information about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: üìß info@bra.gov.so
consent: By using our website or digital services, you acknowledge and consent to this Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
information: Information you provide voluntarily: including your name, email address, phone number, and messages submitted through forms, applications, or online services.
Information collected automatically: including your IP address, browser type, device details, approximate location, and usage activity collected through cookies or similar technologies.
Whenever we request personal information, we will clearly explain why it is needed and how it will be used.
